article.title: Northrop Grumman Supports U.S. Navy Advanced Hawkeye Aircraft.
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Bethpage, New York, is being awarded a $9 million delivery order against a previously issued basic order agreement to provide integrated logistics services in support of four low-rate initial production E-2D Advanced Hawkeye aircraft, to include provisioning technical data for aircraft and engines, as well as support equipment.Â The U.S. Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
